data.content:
verb
-nites; nited; niting
to begin to burn again or to cause (something) to begin to burn again [no obj]
Be careful that the embers don't reignite. [+ obj]
Heat will reignite the smoldering rags.
[+ obj] to give new life or energy to (someone or something)
The incident reignited racial tensions.
to cause (something) to suddenly occur again
The study has reignited debate on the issue.
